channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:25 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporizhzhya region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 15:25 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporizhzhya region.Creck on further messages.#Zaporozhye This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:23 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 15:23 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
